department.en: College of Health Science and Technology

remark.ch: 如需上機實作，則改到志希館I202電腦教室上課，教師會告知到電腦教室之上課日期。

goal.ch: 《生物統計學 -- R語言應用》是一門使用R介紹統計概念的入門課程。我們將涵蓋一般資料分析中的常用描述統計(例如：集中(central)與離散(dispersion)趨勢指標、作圖)與推論統計方法（例如：t檢定(t-tests)、卡方分析(chi-squared analysis)、迴歸(regression)、信賴區間(confidence interval)、二項式檢定(binomial tests)等）。我們將運用理論近似值（例如，中央極限定理）和計算方法（例如，隨機化測試(randomization)和自舉法(bootstrap)）介紹統計推論概念。課程重點將放在理解這些方法並且以R語言實踐，以及解釋與呈現結果，而僅在有助於應用與理解時才強調數學計算與模型的推導。
goal.en: "Biostatistics - the Application of R Language" is an introductory course that uses R to introduce statistical concepts. We will cover commonly used descriptive statistics in general data analysis, such as measures of central and dispersion trends, as well as plotting. We will also cover inferential statistical methods, such as t-tests, chi-squared analysis, regression, confidence intervals, binomial tests, and more. We will introduce concepts of statistical inference using theoretical approximations (e.g., the central limit theorem) and computational methods (e.g., randomization tests and bootstrapping). The emphasis of the course will be on understanding these methods, practicing with the R language, and interpreting and presenting results. Mathematical calculations and model derivations will only be emphasized when they contribute to application and understanding.

W01（09/14） -- L01，課程導向；變數與研究設計，IMS 1+2，

W14（12/14） -- L12，統計推論；第19-20章，R-lab：分類與數值資料的推論

W05(10/12) -- L05,Normality + Central Limit Theorem, IMS,

W07(10/26) -- L07,Review,R lab: Linear regression

flexDiscription.ch: 第17及18兩週將由講師出進階R程式設計問題讓同學解答，若同學有問題可以與講師或助教約時間討論。
flexDiscription.en: In the 17th and 18th weeks, the instructor will provide advanced R programming quizs for students to solve. If students have questions, they can schedule discussions with the instructor or TAs.
